value.title: Equinix uses Precision Robotics in healthcare tech quest
value.excerpt: Digital infrastructure firm Equinix has announced that Precision Robotics, a surgical robotics startup from Imperial College London, has deployed an NVIDIA DGX A100 system in Equinix International Business Exchange HK4 in Hong Kong.

value.title: Mythic AI gets funding to mass-produce edge chips
value.excerpt: Just six months after unveiling its first AI inferencing processor, Mythic AI has announced a new round of funding for $70 million in Series C investment to begin mass production of its chips and to develop its next generation of hardware and software products.

value.title: New $120M round doubles AI startup ASAPP’s valuation to $1.6B
value.excerpt: The startup secured the capital through a Series C round announced today that was led by Fidelity Management. ASAPP’s new $1.6 billion valuation is twice as high as a year ago. ASAPP offers an AI platform for improving the productivity of customer care teams and salespeople.

value.title: Embracing the rapid pace of AI

value.title: Best Stocks To Invest In Right Now? 3 Artificial Intelligence Stocks To Watch
value.excerpt: While investors wonder why stocks are dropping today, artificial intelligence (AI) stocks could be worth watching. Why? For starters, they are likely trading lower in today’s stock market as tech stocks sell-off amidst inflation and crypto-related issues.

value.title: We're Not Prepared for AI Hackers, Security Expert Warns

value.title: IBM’s Research Group Set To Simplify Enterprise AI
value.excerpt: We believe IBM is going to bring its AI research for improved power efficient AI to mainstream data centers. To effectively use its reduced precision AI hardware, it's critical that there be the right software support.

value.title: Maysam Moussalem teaches Googlers human-centered AI
value.excerpt: Originally, Maysam Moussalem dreamed of being an architect. “When I was 10, I looked up to see the Art Nouveau dome over the Galeries Lafayette in Paris, and I knew I wanted to make things like that,” she says. “Growing up between Austin, Paris, Beirut and Istanbul just fed my love of architecture.”

value.title: Pedestrians Said To Need ‘Reprogramming’ For The Benefit Of Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: There is talk of "reprogramming" human pedestrians to cope with the limitations of self-driving cars, which some think is prudent and others say is impractical.

value.title: Qualcomm unveils chips to power the next generation of smartphones
value.excerpt: Qualcomm unveiled its new Snapdragon 778G5G mobile processor platform to power high-end smartphones coming in the second quarter.

value.title: Clarius Introduces First Ultrasound System That Uses AI and Machine Learning to Recognize Anatomy for an Instant Window into the Body
value.excerpt: In its biggest Clarius Ultrasound App update to date, Clarius Mobile Health is introducing the ability for its wireless ultrasound systems to automatically detect body anatomy being scanned by clinicians.

value.title: South Korean startup, cryptocurrency platform to start blockchain bank
value.excerpt: South Korean startup Bloom Technology announced it will join cryptocurrency trading platform IDCM Asia to set up a blockchain-based bank in Dubai.
